p.ml:teaser: Come join us on January 12th at 7pm for another great meeting with the Denver MarkLogic User Group. The meeting is organized by Mike Fagan and takes place at the Auraria Campus, Tivoli Bldg (900 Walnut St. Denver CO. 80204) Rm 320 Section B - Baerresen Ballroom.

ml:details.ml:location: Auraria Campus, Tivoli Bldg (900 Walnut St. Denver CO. 80204) Rm 320 Section B - Baerresen Ballroom/ml:location>
